message.body:
Pertty much, pardner. I came up with nada, no time to hunt...
I have a print from shawn for you.

Yeah, I've been out a fair amount but found nothing. The vegetation is just now getting to the level it was last year when I found a bunch but I don't see shit. Combing really slow but maybe I can move quicker and just look for oysters if there's no chance of morels
Yeah if you get to chamonioux, head to the recycling center and make a right on the trail right before the gate. A quarter down you can climb up into the
center where the fence is down on a giant pile of wood chips. I've found stropharis there
The weather is late this year so I wouldn't give up hope but morels are more of an Ohio and west central mushroom
Yeah but I found like 30 of them in one outing last year. I wonder if a mild winter helps the morels
Did you see those 30lb dryad saddle growing near the recycling center? I am at chamounix . I took that trail last time but couldn't find the wood pile. I'll try again
Hey bro I'm back west. Should I stop by or vice versa?
